    • Method Detail

      • peek

        public int[] peek()
        Returns the next cell without incrementing

      • increment

        public void increment()
        Identifies the relative position of the next adjacent cell according to the direction of the LineString. The horizontal is provided first, followed by the vertical.

      • nextCell

        public int[] nextCell()
        Increments the cell position and retrieves the position of the next adjacent cell
        Returns:
        an integer array containing the relative position of the next adjacent cell

      • setLine

        public void setLine(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineSegment ls)
        Sets the LineSegment defining the path of the digital differential analyzer - i.e. the nextCell() pattern.
        Parameters:
        ls - - the LineSegment indicating a vector path through the grid.
